Reviews.Title: “Comfortable stay with Hoosier Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: eileenh803
Reviews.Content: I wanted to take a moment to thank Lassandra for her exceptional service during my stay. I would like you to know that you have a valuable team member in Lassandra. She is very friendly and welcoming and can prepare a wonderful breakfast quickly. On the morning of 03/15/2012 she had an exceptionally busy morning - with a large group of hungry contractors waiting for her as she opened her station. She didn't miss a beat and served all with a smile ! I went down to breakfast later than usual because of the morning rush - and even after rush - she remained kind and welcoming. She is a wonderful asset to the Embassy Suites family. I travel for my job and visit Indianapolis once or twice a month. I ahave many reasons to look forward to my stay at Embassy Suites and Lassandra is one of those reasons! Eileen Horkan

Reviews.Title: “HVS - Elk River - Franchise Training week.”
Reviews.Author: Clark G
Reviews.Content: Rooms were nice, elevators were a little slow. The high light was in the A.M. Best "breakfast included" I have ever seen in a Hotel. Lassandra was so fast, so skilled, so pleasant, so efficient, she truly was exceptional. (Good service & Good Personality!) (She'll never have to worry about losing her job!) I asked her "What did you put on that pancake?" She said, "Melted Butter". The butter was grilled in! Wow! Lassandra was my "Mom" reincarnated! Thanks! Great Experience!

Reviews.Title: “Lassandra made the best omelets! That's why I love the Embassy Suites!”
Reviews.Author: Kristen1081
Reviews.Content: As always the best part of any Embassy stay is the breakfast....and Lassandra was so friendly as she made my awesome omelet!

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast - A real highlight”
Reviews.Author: David G
Reviews.Content: Beautiful hotel with great service and friendly staff. Made my conference stay quite enjoyable. This was not your typical breakfast-included deal. Each day started with Lassandra cooking up an amazing individualized custom breakfast in the atrium for each patron and doing it so cheerfully it made me feel cheerful just watching her. There's nothing like feeling welcomed and at ease when you're on the road. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “Best stay for a conference!”
Reviews.Author: HVS-Eagan
Reviews.Content: Fantastic stay & great service throughout our business conference. Breakfast offered each morning by Lassandra was exceptional!

Reviews.Title: “Lassandra-The Best Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: Kim F
Reviews.Content: What a pleasure to arrive for breakfast each day to a smiling face that was truly happy to see you and help. Lassandra kept the line moving and made sure each person was treated special. She is truly an asset to your organization!

Reviews.Title: “Lassandra, the omelette cook had great service all week!!”
Reviews.Author: SteveHVS
Reviews.Content: Excellent week stay for our Advance Training Workshop for Home Video Studio. The Omelette cook, Lassandra, provided great service and was very friendly. Seen a few other reviews and I can understand why folks gave her great comments-Thank You Lassandra-it's the little things that make a difference in a hotel stay! Steve Dalbec Home Video Studio Denver, Colorado

Reviews.Title: “The Cook”
Reviews.Author: Mike R
Reviews.Content: Cassandra, the short order breakfast cook, and her overall demeanor was the most charming and pleasant way to wake up each morning and her breakfasts are amazing. When you are on the road and away from home for an entire week, having a friendly face and a warm smile greet you each and every morning is PRICELESS.

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: 272JERALD
Reviews.Content: Lassandra (the cook) at the Embassy Suites in Indy does a fantastic job providing breakfast and connecting with the guests. She makes one feel as if they were at home with her kind smile and wonderful personality. I know that she adds a positive experience to my stay at the Embassy Suites - Indy.

Reviews.Title: “Ahhhhh!”
Reviews.Author: Heidi D
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I were down in Noblesville for a concert and I decided to indulge in a nice hotel for the night. This one sure fit the bill. The room was great, the room service was super friendly and quick. The breakfast was awesome! And it was just a nice hotel to walk around in and relax. I'd definately go back!

Reviews.Title: “Flawless”
Reviews.Author: Rparker316
Reviews.Content: First time my wife and I had gotten away since the baby was born and we were not dissapointed.The rooms are comfortable and functionable.The layout of the hotel is perfect with the fountains and plants in the atarium.The managers special in the evening is outstanding.Snacks and drinks are all free including alchohol for two hours,bartender was great.Now for the breakfast...hands down the best hotel breakfast ever.Hot buffet,tons of cold stuff,as well as made to order omlets,french toast,eggs,and meat.Chef Richard provided delicious food,friendly service and an overall warm envirement.This was a spectacular hotel with a stellar staff and includes amenities that are second to none.If you have Children,do adjust the parental controlls on the telivision before they turn it on,there is some adult programming.Recap:Do not miss the Managers reception or breakfast.This is the perfect balance of class and comfort,enough here to enjoy without going out.If you order in,Roselli's is the place(see my review).Due to the bar and the managers special,you will encounter some intoxicated people,but nothing overt.The pool is adults only from 10pm-12am,shallow though.It isnt downtown which we liked,not so crowded,yet still surrounded by all you need.Thank you Embassy Suites,we will be back with or without the kids ; )

Reviews.Title: “Compliment to the hotel and kitchen staff”
Reviews.Author: Silva59
Reviews.Content: I was a guest at the Embassy Suites Indianapolis North for three nights during the month of January. Embassy Suites is always a favorite of mine for many reasons but especiialy for their renowned "cooked to order" breakfasts. As usual, I was not disappointed. Kudos to Ms. Lassandra for sharing her great smile as she greeted me and the other guests each morning. She made preparing breakfast 'solo' effortlessly for the guests, although it takes a fair amount of talent to move through that many people each day. Of course, the breakfast was delicious!! Hotel staff was courteous and always had pleasant smiles on their faces. Thanks for a great stay, Embassy Suites Indianapolis North!

Reviews.Title: “Hospitality Kitchen”
Reviews.Author: Hawkins C
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Embassy Suites INDY North for 4 days on business recently. Can I tell you I have never been treated so well by anyone in food services in all my years of travel? This hotel has a restaurant and a hospitality kitchen which serves complimentary hot breakfast and a nightly manager's special. Well, as it goes in the IT world I was stuck on a conference call in the room and made it downstairs just minutes after closing. The screen was down and the kitchen already appeared to be cleaned. (BTW it's kept clean even when it is open and serving). This was the third day of my stay so I guess the Chef remembered me. I'd like to think I was getting special treatment because she appeared from nowhere as she saw me shuffling around looking for fruit or whatever I could find. I heard a voice say "have you had anything to eat"? or something to that effect. It sounded so kind, sincere and nurturing to me. I was taken aback because as you know with most places when they’re close they’re close. (doesn’t matter if it is 3-4 minutes after the hour) First, you would not see anyone anywhere and if you did they would be cleaning and closing up shop, and pretending you weren’t there. You gotta picture it, I wasn’t standing at the counter looking for someone the greet me; I was shuffling past the counter when I heard those kind words. After a few uhs an umms I said no actually I haven’t. She ask me what she could make for me…I ordered an omlette which was deliciously made with love and to perfection. (not to hard and not too mushy) Excellent! I had already seen this lady in action earlier in the week with 4-5 orders rolling on the grill at one time and she was handling every guest with the same level of attention and care. 5stars for Lassandra she runs that kitchen likes it’s her own business with love and care for each and every guest I’m sure. I will certainly be back.

Reviews.Title: “Romper Room”
Reviews.Author: hoosiertravelqueen
Reviews.Content: We recently spent a weekend getaway with friends to the Embassy Suites North in Indianapolis. The hotel is very nice, the rooms are roomy and clean. The managers reception and breakfast are both free and wonderful. But we won't be going back anytime soon because it is chaos in the hallways and trying to get an elevator is trying. There was several groups of kids ranging from small to teenagers for some sports gatherings I imagine, and they were completely unsupervised and ran the hallways, from floor to floor, and played in the elevators at any given time of the day. I understand that the parents (or coaches) are the first to blame for not properly parenting or supervising these children, but the hotel has a responsibility to also supervise their facility and unruly guests asked to behave or leave, for the peace and safety of other guests staying there. While eating our breakfast the teens were several floors up throwing candy on top of the diners and when we complained directly to a staff member, he just laughed and did nothing. Its a shame that such a nice hotel with great ammenities loses a guest, but this has happened. I would suggest another hotel unless you can stand the chaos, noise, long waits for the elevators, nearly being knocked down by running kids, and frustration. We came upon this issue last time and thought it was just bad timing to be staying there, but this trip the problem is even worse, so sadly, it will be our last stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Rajeev Bhalerao's Review”
Reviews.Author: brajus14
Reviews.Content: Embassy Suites Indianapolis North is a great place for travelers to stay and relax. Particularly for business folks it's most suitable in many ways...

Reviews.Title: “Housekeeping staff and Breakfast Chef”
Reviews.Author: godup
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel and was very impressed with the staff and service as a whole but have to single out the 5th floor housekeeper who found my cell phone and returned it to the front desk(nameunknown) as well as the cook Lassandra who was very friendly and professional. I was also amazed as how she was able to keep so many food orders straight without writing them down.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay”
Reviews.Author: Tony H
Reviews.Content: This crew sure knows how to wait on you hand and foot. They take good care of their guests and leave nothing to chance. Lassandra, the cook, learned my name and took good care of me every morning with a big smile on her face.

Reviews.Title: “Great Customer Service and Delicious Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: R V
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at this hotel for business and was very impressed with the customer service that I received. The front desk staff were very friendly and courteous. The room I stayed in was spacious, clean, quiet and comfortable. The location was perfect and very close to my office. The best part of my stay were the delicious pancakes and egg white omelets whipped up by Lassandra. A great way to start your day!

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what you expect”
Reviews.Author: sarahj4425
Reviews.Content: Overall the rooms are spacious and clean and the staff is friendly. The manager's reception and breakfast are a great deal. I was also happy that I didn't have to pay for parking. It is conveniently located near the interstate which makes it a great traveling stop. The T.V. was old and small and needed to be updated.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable bed!!”
Reviews.Author: Kristen87
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights at this hotel near Christmas time. Pluses: - bed was incredibly comfortable - balcony doors open to outside for fresh air - quiet location, convenient to interstate but far enough away to be protected from traffic sounds - good coffee in the mornings - nice wine at the managers reception Minuses: - room decor quite dated - very small tv - hotel over run by small children (numerous birthday celebrations going on?) - breakfast mediocre

Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: Bruce2407
Reviews.Content: A last minute reservation didn't get me the best room but I did get a room which was great considering there were three adults and 4 grandkids in the group. The room was a bit dated compared to the new Embassy Suites in Louisville we stayed in over the summer but it was servicable and clean. One 4 year old was awake at 5:30 a.m. so we headed to the lobby to walk around. The staff prepping for breakfast were pleasant and let us wander around as they worked. Another big plus is the deli/ restaraunt that is just across the parking lot. GREAT "food to go" for kids and adults.

Reviews.Title: “Location, amenities and rooms-10 years of satisfaction”
Reviews.Author: taxspeaker
Reviews.Content: For 10 years my company has used the Embassy Suites for business meetings and sleeping rooms several days per year. How can you give a better recommendation than 10 years of repeat business spending thousands of dollars for meetings? Staff is wonderful, sleeping and meeting rooms are great, location is exceptional with close proximity to restaurants and Interstate, and recent updates to the pool are well received. We did notice some roof leakage in the atrium area and the pool area was in need of cleaning-dirty floor and open storage of pool equipment.

Reviews.Title: “Embassy Suites Review”
Reviews.Author: Paul C
Reviews.Content: Excellent Hotel and Staff everyone is so friendly and willing to go out of their way to make your stay enjoyable. I would like to make one comment in particular about an employee by the name of Lassandra. Lassandra is the breakfast chef. When I come to Indy for business I stay at your hotel because of her famous breakfast omelets and her wonderful smile. Her cooking reminds me of my mothers cooking, thanks Lassandra for bringing those memories back. Paul Carter Regional Sales Manager

Reviews.Title: “Frequentguest”
Reviews.Author: Cynthia R
Reviews.Content: The staff at this hotel are great. The location is convenient for my work when I am in Indianapolis so it is a treat to stay with such a friendly and positive staff. Lassandra does a terrific job in the mornings with breakfast even when things get super busy. Debbie at the front desk is so warm that you forget that it is beginning to get cold outside.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, tired property needing renvoation.”
Reviews.Author: swisstravelguru
Reviews.Content: I spent 4 days here recently attending a conference. The staff are wonderful and deserve praise for their helpfulness and positive attitude. The property itself shows its age (I'm guessing between 20 and 30 years) and is badly in need of major renovation. While attending a meeting in one of the conference rooms, I looked up at the ceiling and saw dust, dirt and possibly, mold in the fluorescent lamp enclosure, indicating that it hadn't been cleaned in a long time. The hydraulic elevators are quirky, you press the floor button and wait, hoping you won't get stuck. Otherwise the hotel has everything going for it - good location (Costco next door, hotel guests receive a free day pass by showing their room keycard), free WiFi, free cooked breakfast, free cocktail hour etc. I didn't find the bed very comfortable, but that may have been my problem.

Reviews.Title: “breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Donna G
Reviews.Content: Lassandra the chef that prepares breakfast in the morning does an excellent job and very friendly and does what is ask of her with a smile on her face everyday. Give her the kudos please. When we return home all I hear from my husband is how much he misses the breakfast. Keep up the good work everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great for Business”
Reviews.Author: businesstraveler486
Reviews.Content: Travel for Business 4 nights a week and Embassy Suites Indianapolis Rocks. The staff is so polite. It is everthing a business traveler needs....... and no surprises and no head aches. I Like that.

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast Service”
Reviews.Author: Renee M
Reviews.Content: Every morning we stayed at the Embassy Suites we were provided with a cook to order breakfast served by Lassandra! She does an amazing job at coordinating everyones food and there is never too long of a line! My two children thoroughly enjoyed her cooking and we missed it when we had to return home. Her french toast and pancakes were a hit! Her omlettes looked amazing, however I did love her eggs that you could have any way you liked. So if you are thinking about staying here, make sure you don't skip out on a delicious breakfast cooked by Lassandra!

Reviews.Title: “The best breakfast made by Lassandra!”
Reviews.Author: Dalton K
Reviews.Content: I loved and looked forward to breakfast we ate with my wife the one week we stayed over. She is a gifted cook, fast, polite and very likeable. She made our mornings.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - would stay again”
Reviews.Author: NanaCathy
Reviews.Content: I was traveling on business to Indianapolis this month (Oct 2011), and was unable to locate a good hotel rate downtown (the Colts were playing that weekend), so stayed on the north end at the Embassy Suites. The lobby was very nice, with efficient check-in, clean room and bathroom and a simple, but good, breakfast. Maybe because it was a Sunday night and/or low occupany rate, that the only "hot" breakfast items were omelets - no sausage, pancakes, etc. However, it was fine and was not a big deal. I like Embassy Suites and always enjoy my stay.

Reviews.Title: “Unable to sleep...”
Reviews.Author: MissAnnieB1969
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this Embassy Suites twice in the past month for one night each time as I was in Indianapolis for a personal matter and too tired to drive home. The first stay wasn't so bad. I requested extra towels and they were delivered to my room upon arrival, which was nice, because I have stayed in a few Hilton brand hotels and have not received my special requests. The breakfast was pretty good for a buffet style complementary breakfast. The eggs were cooked well and the food was hot/fresh. Before my second night, which was this past weekend, I used e-check in to secure my reservation. I had been given a room on the 8th floor, which is what I'd hoped. I finally arrived at the hotel around 5 pm after a long day of running around Indianapolis and was given a room on the 5th floor, no big deal, I understand that the room isn't guaranteed. However, when I walked into the room and into the bedroom area to put my suitcase on the bed I saw something dark on the bedding. I walked closer and I'm not certain, but I believe that someone had used the bedding as a tissue and wiped his/her nose on it. It was a large spot and it made me sick. I grabbed a washcloth with warm water and cleaned the bedding, went back to the sink at the bedroom vanity area and noticed hairs along the top of the sink basin. My family wanted some food, so I went across the street to get some barbeque carry out. I am a Hilton Honors Diamond member and I don't typically complain about anything. I am used to finding a stray hair or two in a hotel bathroom or a carpet stain that makes me a little queasy, but this was the first time I'd found anything so revolting. I stopped by the front desk to explain and was offered dinner or something to make up for it, which was nice. I explained that I was going across the street to a place my family had requested and that was ok. She told me to think about it and to let her know what they could do, a movie, something. I agreed and went to get our food. As I sat waiting for the carry out, I really thought about this. After seeing the bedding, I sure didn't want to eat dinner there, I didn't want a movie, I just wanted a clean room. They must have been sold out, because I wasn't offered a clean room. I was offered clean bedding. This really made me question how clean the room was and I had a hard time resting that night, in fact, I didn't rest. I did take them up on the movie offer and it actually appeared on my bill and I had to ask to have it removed. Anyway, I took the movie because I felt that I should go ahead and get something, but what I really wanted was to rest assured in a clean room.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jason J
Reviews.Content: Lassandra is one of the cooks there and that woman has a gift. She does a great job with service and she makes quite possibly the best grits I have ever eaten!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: abbalish
Reviews.Content: Stayed with my husband for one night while we were in town for a concert. Lots of shopping and restaurants very closeby. The happy hour was one of the best I've seen, with expanded options for snacks and drinks. They also had a cute parrot in the lobby, which we were very entertained by. All in all, a great stay and we'll definitely come back the next time we're not planning on staying downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Work Conference”
Reviews.Author: jpatridge
Reviews.Content: This place is a very good place for conferences etc. I have only stayed here a few times for work and each time its great. I can not speak towards the value as I don't pay for my room (company does) but the facility is nice and updated.

Reviews.Title: “Lassandra Makes It Special”
Reviews.Author: drifter33
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel for 3 nights on business, but my family would have enjoyed it too. As usual, Embassy Suites has spacious rooms that are very clean, so the hotel is standard. The upgraded Manager's Happy Hour was a nice plus, but breakfast time is where they shine. It is a busy area at breakfast with loads of seating. Lassandra will make your free cook-to-order eggs, pancakes, or omelets. She is extremely friendly and she takes her job personally. She had 7 orders going when I placed mine, but I only waited about 5 minutes for a scrumptious omelet. It takes more time for me to make it at home and forget about those other breakfast places. She also makes sure that you have all the fixings that you want and even butters your toast if you're feeling lazy. The other breakfast staff is great as they pleasantly clear a table almost immediately. I think jlovestotravel 04 was talking about another location because valet isn't necessary in the big parking lot. The hotel is close to several restaurants and some shopping, making it very convenient. Internet is extra if not a Hilton Honors Member so sign up for the free membership before you go. The internet was spotty at times, but okay for my usage.

Reviews.Title: “Great place. Comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: zack s
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay. Staff and setup makes this hotel like home. Always first class and very easy access to food, entertainment, etc. Would stay again any time!

Reviews.Title: “Lassandra Made My Day!”
Reviews.Author: Richard F
Reviews.Content: Lassandra is the morning grill chef that is that bright ray of sunshine, warm smile and friendly voice greeting you in the morning to take your order for breakfast at Embassy North. I have traveled extensively (domestic & international) throughout my 30+ years in business and stayed at the best and worst hotels around the globe. Lassandra makes this good hotel "special" and an experience that lifts your spirits and stays with you long after her excellently prepared breakfast. Lassandra is the reason I will always stay here when I travel to Indy.

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast service - Lassandra”
Reviews.Author: Tony L
Reviews.Content: Each morning I stayed at the hotel, Lassandra went above and beyond to make exactly what I wanted for Breakfast. I didn't see the blueberry pancakes on the menu the second day so I asked if she had any made up, she did not at that moment, but once again she specially made me blueberry pancakes from scratch!! What a treat! As a frequent business traveler all hotels start to look the same, but this special service differentiates your facility. Thank you Lassandra!!! Keep smiling!!

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for a property near the airport this isn't it. 30+ minute ride to/from. It worked for where my meeting was. ”
Reviews.Author: aviation101
Reviews.Content: The property was very clean and well kept. I was a little disappointed in the TV. Lights and light switches seemed to be in odd locations. I think the space used for the sink in the bedroom could be better used as a closet and take the hulking free standing out to give more space.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Ella35805
Reviews.Content: We love staying at the Embassy Suites. We enjoy having a suite and a fridge and microwave. The room was nicely decorated and the bed was comfortable. Our favorite part of staying at Embassy Suites is the free cooked to order breakfast. You can orader an egg an way or an omlet with your choice of indegredients . The cook makes right there where you can watch. They also have cereal, french toast,pancakes,fresh fruit etc. The cook there is Lassandra and she is excellent as well as very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, but far from downtown”
Reviews.Author: jrosenb23
Reviews.Content: I tried to reserve a room at the hotel downtown but they were all booked due to a gaming convention so I went with this one which gave our group (Illinois Swimming) a good rate. Unfortunately, the hotel is quite far from downtown -- about 15-20 mins with light traffic. That said, the front desk staff were very helpful, and nothing went wrong at all during this stay. I used the fitness facility once and it has relatively new cardio equipment although the view of the parking lot is less than inspiring. I applaud the hotel for accommodating the early rising needs of our group by setting up a cold breakfast by 6:15am on Sat and Sun versus the normal 7:30 start. Not alot of variety around the hotel for eating, etc... (we did any decent meals downtown), but there is a nice deli and a few chain restaurants very close by that were staffed by very nice people and we ate pretty decently all things considered. Overall, nothing wrong with hotel, just not a great location for this stay. Otherwise, if location works for you, this could be a good place.

Reviews.Title: “If my son was graduating again, we would go back”
Reviews.Author: Arlicia T
Reviews.Content: Our son graduated from Indiana University, Bloomington in May of this year. I began my hotel search in January. I thought that was enough time....wrong! All hotels anywhere remotely close to the school was booked solid. If there were a few rooms left, the price to accommodate all my family members was almost enough to pay another semester at IU! To my dismay, I search and searched. Finally I found Embassy Suites-North in Indianapolis. It was a drive to the University, but I didn't mind because the price was somewhat reasonable and the staff was awesome! Lassandra, one of the cooks at the food court, was amazing! She always greeted you with a smile in the morning and her omelets were to die for! Also, Supervisor, Debbie Flemming-Little at the Front desk, was very nice. When we checked in she was the only person at the front desk, but she handled our family and the other guests checking in with skill and finness.

Reviews.Title: “Not blown away. Not disappointed.”
Reviews.Author: 2labsmom
Reviews.Content: Just finished staying. Room was clean, and beds comfortable. I have a bad back and usually wake up in pain, but had no problems here. Rooms are getting older, and the place was packed so seating was at a premium for breakfast. Love the coffee at breakfast, but room coffee and coffee maker leave a lot to be desired (although that can be said for pretty much any hotel). Only annoyance were the elevators. Seemed like we had to wait a long time no matter going to or coming from our room. Finally, just a note to all hotels in general. Charging anything for internet anymore is just plain stupid, and a sign that you're behind the times.

Reviews.Title: “WE DON'T STAY ANYWHERE ELSE!”
Reviews.Author: Jadesmomma
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here on several occasions over the years. I like staying on the top floor with the patio door, and this is my daughters favorite thing also. My husband and I have privacy away from our daughter with the two room suite with two tvs. And the breakfast is wonderful! Great value for the money and I love the location.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the cook during breakfast time”
Reviews.Author: LRamos747
Reviews.Content: The cook Lassandra Camprell provides excellent service. She's always cheerful and goes out of her way to accommodate us! Just love her!

Reviews.Title: “June 2011 Trip”
Reviews.Author: doccgood
Reviews.Content: As always the service was excellent. I always look forward to speaking with Lassandra in the morning while she cooks my breakfast. She is always pleasant and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Best breakfast - FREE too!!”
Reviews.Author: becky654321
Reviews.Content: Lassandra cheffed a 'short-order breakfast grill' that was excellent! Breakfast made the way you like it. Omlets, pancakes, french toast, hash browns and more all made fresh and quickly. Thank you Lassondra :)

Reviews.Title: “Love the hotel!”
Reviews.Author: lahnie1675
Reviews.Content: This is our 2nd stay at this hotel... The lobby is gorgeous, the kids loved Sweetie.... There was a mix-up with the room we reserved, but the front desk staff quickly and very politely rectified it. The rooms are beginning to show their age, so it's time for an update... Like a previous reviewer stated, the bathrooms are small, but the rooms are large. I rated cleanliness lower because we found a previous guests deodorant on a chair, as well as a previous guests shoe peeking from under the bed. It appears housekeeping isn't observant when cleaning up... But the tables in the room were clean, the bathroom was clean and we knew they vacuumed, because the kids made a mess of chips on the floor... On our last trip here, the pool was absolutely freezing-so cold we couldn't use it... This trip, it was cool-but not so cold we couldn't make use of it-and the kids enjoyed it. The pool area is also another place that needs some renovating (and if they could heat the pool (and I thought this place was supposed to have a heated pool) instead of relying on the sun, that would be even better). Breakfasts were fantastic each morning-we had the omelets daily, as well as the other items on the breakfast bar-there was something for everyone! Overall, it was an enjoyable experience!

Reviews.Title: “This is the third time I've been to this property, and I LOVE IT! The workers at the hotel are so kind, wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: nicole_e_padilla
Reviews.Content: I wanted to really give some good feedback about some specific people that work for the Embassy and made my stay especially comfortable. Lassandra Campbell made my breakfast for me every morning with a huge smile, and was so kind. Thank you Cassandra! Debbie gave us a ride to the office in the morning a few times, and she was so funny, and awesome! There is another person that I can't remember his name (sorry) but he works at night and has given us a ride a few times when Debbie wasn't available. Anyway, to the staff and management at Embassy Suites in Indy, THANK YOU for your hospitality and I look forward to seeing you again in September!

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: Ferranteo
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed the continental breakfast. Lassandra is a great cook. Her pancakes and omelet were delicious. She gets an A+.

Reviews.Title: “The service was excellent”
Reviews.Author: rochelle1107
Reviews.Content: Breakfast was wonderful every morning Thanks to Lassandra,she is the best chef and she loves what she does. I will definitely stay here again if not for anything else but the breakfast, keep up the good work Lassandra. People love eating breakfast with out the hassle of going out you can have it your way. Most hotels allow for free internet without you being an honors customers, need to work on that.

Reviews.Title: “good”
Reviews.Author: mm2659
Reviews.Content: The breakfast chef Lassandra made our stay a pleasure! She always greeted us with a smile and gave us the absolute best service. My family and I enjoyed each day of breakfast ,the delicious omlettes and french toast were awesome we all were thorougly pleased with her services!

Reviews.Title: “great service, especially the morning cook!”
Reviews.Author: appreciate46
Reviews.Content: I use this Embassy Suite regularly for business purposes because the staff and service is excellent and I particularly appreciate the morning cook Lassandra because no matter the morning traffic she gives everyone individual attention and my order is "always" as I request. You all have a "Great Team" at this location!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Accommodations”
Reviews.Author: Seas0ned-Traveler09
Reviews.Content: The hotel of choice for our Indy business travels. Staff treats guests like family, notably, our breakfast chef, Lassandra. She has a way of making every customer feel special and at the same time accurately and efficiently handle our breakfast orders.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly attentive staff, comfortable rooms”
Reviews.Author: BitTraveler
Reviews.Content: Top notch staff who care, and try to accommodate with requests. I've stayed at other Embassy's before and after, and have not stayed at one I'd call home more than this location. Definitely feel comfortable and relaxed walking in the door after a long hard day. One nice touch here is that the door curtains close completely over the front door, giving complete privacy, unlike some. Lassandra is a absolutely wonderful asset (and has great suggestions when you are too tired in the morning to think of what you want.) I know some will complain about the hydraulic elevators being slow (they are, but at least they work), and some touch ups needed here or there. I know that I was moved without an issue when the HVAC unit stopped working.

Reviews.Title: “I wish I got treated like this at home..”
Reviews.Author: gsgt59
Reviews.Content: For the last 5 weeks I have stayed at the Embassy Suites north. I have had the absolute best service of any hotel I have stayed in this year. Since I travel for a living, I have stayed in many different hotels, some good, some not so much. The staff at this hotel has been outstanding. Sherrin, Cody and Zack have all been great. Their willingness to go the extra mile for their guests has really impressed me and that is not easy to do. This is the first time I have bothered to fill out a review if it was not filled out in disgust or anger. For me that says it all. Also, the breakfast service is outstanding.. Lassandra and her crew are simply fabulous. Lassandra has been the ultimate embodiment of, Service with a smile. Not only does she make a mean omlette, she never loses her smile no matter how busy she is and I can tell you on some days I dont know how she managed it. Over all I rate this hotel far above any others. This is to include the Hilton Hotels, the Embassy Suites, the Marriots and lastly the Holiday Inn expresses I have stayed in this year. This hotel offers the perfect blend of accomadations and outstanding customer service. Ifyou like being pampered this is the hotel for you. Sincerely, Steven Stefanu

Reviews.Title: “Serious updates needed throughout and maybe a upgrade on furniture!!!”
Reviews.Author: Hartsada
Reviews.Content: Hello. This hotel was not as great as posted in this site. We have stayed at many Embassy suites in the past and were very disappointed with this hotel. We requested a low floor prior to check in and when we verified this hotel on out way down, we were told the only rooms were the third floor and up. The entire 2nd floor was being cleaned (or so we thought). We checked into our room and I wanted one with a balcony that opened outside. The hotel cooperated and granted us that wish. However, the wish would put us up one floor. We gave it thought and said yes. We checked in and went out to eat. Upon our return, we turned on the lights in our room and were horrified at the stains on the couch, bugs behind the microwave and a big dent in the door. I was very apprehensive about sleeping in this room so we asked to be moved. There were no other rooms available since they were full the night before. They only cleaned a small amount of rooms so we really had to either stay in this room or continue looking for another room or even another location. Sharon called the Homestead Inn down the street since they too were Hiltons, but their rates were quite high. So we went and again to move to another room. (This was 4 times now and 2 were my choices and 2 were due to the unclean rooms that we were put in at first. Monday afternoon we went into the pool. That was another misfortune as the pool had some like foam or fiberglass at the bottom. When I went up the stairs, I grabbed the railing and it came right out of the cement. It was very broken and I cannot believe it was missed. I was furious at all the issues and requested to speak to a manager. He came into the pool and we pointed out all the issues and all the other problems experienced by us at this facility. The manager offered to pay for a night stay for us but really offered no apology only that the hotel was booked solid over the weekend by a team of soccer players ( I am not sure what this has to do with all our issues, but that was his answer). We decided to leave and find another hotel on Tuesday and when we checked out, the free night was on our bill but NOT ONE INDIVIDUAL expressed any apology for all the issues we dealt with at this hotel. I am not sure why we were not worth their time but I found this to be very disturbing by a huge hotel chain as this one. The ONLY good point about this hotel was the breakfast bar and the wonderful cook Lassandra. She was the sunshine on a rainy day and she cooked ALL of our breakfast to meet our every need. She was very happy and I could tell she loved her job very much. I think she was one of the assets of this hotel and I hope she receives recognition. Another person who made our stay comfortable was Rhonda who cleared our table and we talked a great deal with her. She is one very proud mom to her kids. The third individual who made the stay worthwhile was the bird Sweetie. She was very sweet and we enjoyed seeing her when we went down the reception area. Other then that, there was not too much more to say about this hotel!!

Reviews.Title: “excellent value for family or business”
Reviews.Author: bilymon
Reviews.Content: excellent value for family or business. The entire staff was very friendly and helpful, including the desk staff, the bartenders, and especially Lassandra, the sweet lady who cooks the complimentary breakfasts.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service for every breakfast meal.”
Reviews.Author: Baseball99
Reviews.Content: Lassandra was a delight and cooked each breakfast meal just perfect and with a large smile. What a delight to have a warm smile and a great breakfast to start out day. We stayed 5 days and breakfast was our favorite meal. Lassandra made my boys fresh pancakes ot order each day she cooked for us. Thank you for making our stay such a pleasure. I'm a diamond member and I can tell you that we received excellent restaurant service.

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast With A Smile”
Reviews.Author: Undrey
Reviews.Content: This review is for the cook, Lassandra. who prepared breakfast each morning. She was pleasant, accurate and handled the onslaught of people each morning with a smile. She did this with very little help from other staff members. It was a pleasure to greet her each morning.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff People”
Reviews.Author: KzooGreen
Reviews.Content: The front desk manager was super friendly and remembered our family and always asked about our day of adventures with the kids. Lassandra the super breakfast maker, very kindly made me blueberry pancakes (even though they weren't offered that day) after I mentioned that I loved them the day prior.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, especially breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: Takkarian
Reviews.Content: Wonderful weekday breakfast from Lassandra, every morning it's made wonderfully. The ammenities in the hotel are also great, the exception may be the rooms themselves with older style TV's.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for everyone in the family.”
Reviews.Author: Nikkiwoodson
Reviews.Content: Great breakfast! Lassandra who made the cook to order breakfast was amazing!

Reviews.Title: “Sincere, warm and personalized commitment to our total satisfaction.”
Reviews.Author: MrG2011
Reviews.Content: Wesley was both kind and professional in booking our reservation. Who would have guessed it was his first day on the job! Lassandra, the breakfast chef, completely embodied what "commitment to customer satisfaction" is supposed to look like. She not only prepared our breakfast exactly as we requested, she did so with a sincere and warm smile. That pretty much defines this hotel - sincere and warm. Great job, Embassy! We will DEFINITELY be back.

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast Chef”
Reviews.Author: Nancyr4
Reviews.Content: I hate mornings. However, when I stay at this hotel and Lassandra greets me at the made-to-order breakfast bar with her wonderful smile and cheerful attitude my day is made. Then no matter what I order she creates and serves it with the same attitude and smile. Needless to say the food is always delicious!! Embassy Suites has a gold mine in Lassandra.

Reviews.Title: “The perks are the best.”
Reviews.Author: thehoesmans
Reviews.Content: Managers reception and cooked to order breakfast is fabulous.

Reviews.Title: “Morning Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: dos2amigos
Reviews.Content: Lassandra who was the chef who prepared the morning cook to order breakfast for the guest staying at the hotel did an outstanding job in preparing the breakfast each morning. She greeted each guest in very friendly and pleasant mannger and prepared each order to the guest satisfaction. She particulary remember me even though I had not been back to the hotel since June 2007. It was most impressive that she is able to remember - considering the number of cook to order breakfast that she has prepared during the t3 1/2 year time frame.

Reviews.Title: “Great family getaway”
Reviews.Author: springisch
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with our 3yo and 10 mo old. It was great having a 2 room suite, although we could still hear people out in the atrium while we were trying to sleep in the room farthest from the door. Manager's reception and continental breakfast were great. The pool was great, and staff did a great job of keeping it family friendly for a weekend (no kids swimming without adults, no balls throwing around). Service was great, very friendly staff. We would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Service with a smile!”
Reviews.Author: ChristyGirl1031
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to take a moment to rave about the wonderful breakfasts I received during the 3 days I was there. Lassandra was the chef at the counter and she was so very friendly. She made to my order pancakes which were truly delicious. Her service was truly superb. In fact I really enjoyed my interactions with all the hotel staff. Everyone was very friendly, introduced themselves and offered to help with any of my needs. I stayed in a suite with a King bed and it was very quiet and comfortable. The hotel atmosphere was beautifully decorated and very inviting. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my fellow co-workers.

Reviews.Title: “Lassandra was Great!”
Reviews.Author: sschrader3
Reviews.Content: I stayed in Indianapolis, IN this past week and enjoyed every morning when Lassandra was preparing breakfast for us. She always had a smile and that made your morning as well. Thanks for the hospitality Lassandra. The rooms were nice but the chairs and floors were dirty. Everything else was grat.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay--loved the free breakfast and happy hour”
Reviews.Author: Eric37209
Reviews.Content: We were displaced by a flood happening at our house. We have a 2 year old and 4 week old, but we are very comfortable here. Rooms are plenty big with room dividing door. 2 particularly nice things are the free breakfast and happy hour. At breakfast, our new buddy Lassandra does a very impressive job taking multiple orders while cooking, thus getting food out quickly while being very friendly. We had a great stay!

Reviews.Title: “elegant hotel with great staff”
Reviews.Author: woo2go
Reviews.Content: This hotel is absolutely beautiful. The atrium really made my stay relaxing with all the plants and breakfast areas. I love the breakfast, it's the best anywhere, The cook is friendly and there are so many food options. The suites are clean and there is a great view. The pool is a good temperature. Elegant lobby and glass elevators. Overall, I wished I could have stayed longer.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased”
Reviews.Author: Sharkie0384
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with the overall stay that my team had at this hotel. It is a very nice facility with some shining stars that made our stay even better. We were all very impressed with Lassandra. She was a huge part of our overall pleasant experience with the hotel. It was so nice to have someone who was so pleasant, kind, and seemed to be an overall nice person as her be the first friendly face most of us saw. Kudos to the Suites for have an amazing staff!

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Es_G_X
Reviews.Content: Lassandra took great care of us...she is the breakfast chef and made sure we had a home cooked meal to start the day. Clean rooms, courteous staff, decent workout facilities.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay was visually lovely and relaxing!”
Reviews.Author: withmyhusband
Reviews.Content: The entire staff was very professional and friendly, moving things right along. Our room was very lovely and the courtyard was totally charming. Also, the breakfast chef, Lassandra, was as sweet and charming as she could be, serving a delicious, made-to-order, breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “We had a wonderful stay at the Embassy Suites!”
Reviews.Author: julie1288
Reviews.Content: I wanted to write this review because our breakfast was wonderful. Lassandra took extra care to make sure our food was to our satisfaction and our kids had what they liked. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, good value”
Reviews.Author: kentkatnik
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean, the rooms well appointed, and a decent value. Lassandra who cooks the made-to-order breakfast is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “Superb”
Reviews.Author: travel_trainer41
Reviews.Content: I travel often but what set this hotel apart was the "made to order" breakfast. The cook, Lassandra was pleasant and he food was delicious. Oh and the evening reception was really nice too.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel,Great Service, especially the chef Lassandra”
Reviews.Author: 36864Goodtimes
Reviews.Content: Relaxing and enjoyable; great evening managers reception. The breakfast chef goes out of her way to prepare you meal just the way you like it. She reacts to the guest every request.

Reviews.Title: “Service with a Smile”
Reviews.Author: Rottas6
Reviews.Content: We especially enjoyed the breakfast service provided by Lassandra. She was friendly and we looked forward to seeing her smiling face each morning.

Reviews.Title: “Lassandra - Breakfast COOK”
Reviews.Author: jrrout
Reviews.Content: You sure don't want to miss this - to start your day with a fine breakfast served by Chef Lassandra. She is just fantastic and should be considered as an asset to any place she prefers to work for.

Reviews.Title: “Lassandra fixed the best breakfast I've had in a long time.”
Reviews.Author: nekghtjds
Reviews.Content: Hotel room floor was stained. Bar attendant left early and had no backup for about an hour.

Reviews.Title: “Best breakfast ever!”
Reviews.Author: aaokeefe
Reviews.Content: Lassandra Campbell made an omelet for me and it was by far the best omelet I've ever had. I look forward to another breakfast while staying at Embassy Suites!

Reviews.Title: “Great breakfast to order - Rooms clean...Nice overall”
Reviews.Author: cozytraveler27527
Reviews.Content: I moved to the this location after being placed in a horrible hotel. I knew from other Embassy Suites that I could expect a nice room and good service. The room was very nice and clean and the staff was wonderful. In particular, Lassandra ( I think that was her name) made a wonderful breakfast to order each morning. She was delightful and the breakfast was wonderful. I do wish there was an additional meat item of choice (turkey products are a bit healthier and other Embassy Suites are beginning to offer it). The elevators were a bit scary as they are older but overall nice place to stay. I have recommended that my company use this hotel and plan to stay there upon my next visit to Indy.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME”
Reviews.Author: jillwatkins
Reviews.Content: I stay at this hotel frequently for business travel and just wanted to let you all know that Lassandia Campbell (complimentary breakfast chef) is AWESOME. She is always cheerful on top of also being a wonderful cook. She makes being away from home a little easier :-)

Reviews.Title: “Begin & end the day with a smile”
Reviews.Author: Sundin4
Reviews.Content: It's been years since staying at an Embassy Suites, perhaps too long! Each morning was a joy when greated by Lassandra Campbell who quickly cooked eggs "to order" & oh those pancakes! Good thing the fitness room is well equipped (though could use another bike). It was also easy to unwind after a day of meetings with the open bar! Update the old TVs and you've earned an "excellent" rating...

Reviews.Title: “Conference Venue”
Reviews.Author: jmnzel
Reviews.Content: Our organization held our annual 3 day conference at Embassy Suites. The level of service was amazing! I was the conference organizer and not only myself but our entire staff was treated very well. The conference wouldn't have went so smoothly if we didn't have all day access to one of their staff members. The hotel had dedicated staff members on site throughout the entire conference ready to assist us in any way possible. Our attendees raved about the hotel's elegence. Granted, this hotel isn't downtown but you just couldn't compete with their staff. I honestly don't feel we would have received the same level of service downtown. There isn't anything I can say that is negative. Also, you can't beat free, made to order/buffet, breakfast, free parking, clean and comfortable rooms, and again, excellent service. I highly recommend anyone who is looking at holding a conference in Indianapolis to check out Embassy Suites North. Lastly, to give you an idea of our conference. It was held over three days, 4 workshops/presentations every hour, 13+ exhibitor tables, and 2 evening social events.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Amazing!”
Reviews.Author: gottaloveit7771
Reviews.Content: My family and I had a great vacation stay at the Embassy suites. They had free cocktails every day. An amazing breakfast with the most delicious omelets! And best of all an indoor pool! We had absolutely no complaints. Would stay there again, and recommend to everyone. I know they tend to be more pricey, but honestly, it is DEFINITELY worth the extra money.

Reviews.Title: “Par excellent!!!”
Reviews.Author: TwoU
Reviews.Content: From the check in clerks to cooks to housecleaners this place rates the Best of the best. Carrsandra, the best morning chef, cook our morning breakfast for a week; we felt so spolied by her wonderful cooking and friendly attitude no matter how busy she was, she had her special morning smile on while serving us. Our favorite desk clerk listened to us and offered directions to where we were going to quilt shops (Quilt Quarter & Quilt Plus) Yarn shops at Zionville, and other sttichery & crafts. And to different eating places in the area. We look forward to a return trip as soon as we can. It was the Best of the Best in the USA.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff, Great Location, a winner in my book.”
Reviews.Author: mlsrar
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a weekend, booking through Orbitz (normally I'm a priceline/hotwire buyer, but the reviews swayed me to book confirmed here and not take my chances.) The staff was friendly, and accommodating to the fullest extent. As with all Embassy suites, there is a nightly drinks/snack reception, though the snacks consisted of potato chips and doritos one night, with a snack-mix the next. I've seen more lavish spreads at other ES properties, but the bartender was efficient and moved the line quickly. The breakfast was fantastic, nice selection of fruit, pastries, cooked-to-order eggs/omelets as well as french toast. If you did not want to wait, the scrambled eggs were real, not powdered, and cooked with some seasoning. It was a nice touch. The room was typical of most Embassy Suites, the pillows were nice and firm, the bathroom was clean, though a bit small. As with many Hilton properties, the WiFi is not free, not was it particularly fast. (The gentleman checking us in comped it for us!) The atrium, found in many properties, can create a somewhat noisy environment, and it seems like these properties are full frequently. We were tucked away in a corner, so noise was not an issue. The pool area was crowded, and the water was quite chilly, but it was clean and towels were stocked frequently. Being next-door to Costco is a bonus, and you are just down the street from a Trader Joe's and a slew of other restaurants of a variety of gastronomies are nearby. Overall, it was a great stay and we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Without question, THE BEST hotel we've stayed in”
Reviews.Author: lovetoserve
Reviews.Content: We have stayed twice in this hotel. We absolutely LOVE it. The staff is amazing, helpful and friendly. The hotel is so close to everything you need. If ever we return to Indy, this is our hotel, no question! It doesn't get better than the Embassy :)

Reviews.Title: “A valuable employee”
Reviews.Author: hdscss1
Reviews.Content: I stayed at your hotel so I would be near the hospital where my daught was having brain surgery. Needless I was very upset. When I went down for breakfast the young ladie cooking greeted me with the biggest smile and good morning not one morning but every morning of my 4 day stay. I thanked her and told her why I was there. I let her know and now you as to how much that was appreciated. Her name is Lassandra Campbell. In my book employee of the YEAR. All you employees were great and made the stay great. Thanks to all.

Reviews.Title: “Embassy Suites was AMAZING!”
Reviews.Author: funlady83
Reviews.Content: Our company has been staying at Embassy Suites for three years because they have the best accomodations and atmosphere in Indianapolis. We wake up every morning to wonderfully cooked to order breakfast by cook Lassandra Campbell. I attend business conferences all day at the hotel, they provide our lunch which is delicious. The hotel staff is so pleasant and great. They really aim to please. Then comes my favorite part of the day business hour from 5:30 to 7:30 p.m. you get free cocktails and snacks. It is really relaxing.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Hotel I ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: AngelaBush
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed this hotel. I loved the staff and the hotel itself. I especially enjoyed the breakfast. Lassandra Campbell was AWSOME during breakfast. She is great at her job and has a beautiful and friendly personality.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely !!!!”
Reviews.Author: judeegrodesky
Reviews.Content: I attended the annual Ahepa Housing Service Coordinators Conference Oct 4- 8,2010 at Embassy Suites North in Indy, The hotel is lovely & the suites are wonderful. I so appreciated the coffee service, fridge & micro wave which makes the guest feel right at home. The customer service is outstanding. The complimentary breakfast is awesome with the chef,Lassandra Campbell, creating every delicious breakfast variety one can imagine. She is so fast it is like watching poetry in motion plus her personality is a delight. The 2 waitresses I got to know were Keisha & Sarah. They were everywhere all week making sure we were taken care of & meeting ALL our needs. I would recommend this hotel to all groups for conferences & any family looking for a lovely & comfortable hotel. The food was delicious ,the beds were wonderful and ALL the staff hit it out of the park !!!!!

Reviews.Title: “We like Embassy Suites in general. This...”
Reviews.Author: fwrunner
Reviews.Content: We like Embassy Suites in general. This time, however, we were dissapointed in the breakfast buffett. The "hot" syrup was not hot. The line for omlets went way too slow. Also the pancakes on the buffett we cold. On the plus side, though, the room was clean the ceck-in went fast and smooth. We also enjoyed the manager's reception with free drinks. The bed was very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “The breakfast and manager's reception is...”
Reviews.Author: Iwanicki41401
Reviews.Content: The breakfast and manager's reception is wonderful! Lassandra Cambell makes an awesome breakfast to your particular taste. And, she is super nice no matter how early in the morning it might be which is a great way to start your day!

Reviews.Title: “Functional but doesn't have the "edge" most Embassy Suites have.”
Reviews.Author: christasmomma
Reviews.Content: I was double charged for internet service. I brought the mistake to the person at the front desk and wasn't even offered an apology. The breakfast buffet only included fruit and yogurt, not the usual self serve scrambled eggs, home fries and bacon. We had to wait close to 20 minutes for our breakfast omelets. The cook, Lassandra Campbell, was OUTSTANDING! She was efficient, pleasant, and managed at least 6 orders at once. SHE exemplified what Embassy Suites should be all about.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: kylesmith2221
Reviews.Content: I had to stay there for 6 to 7 days at a time for multiple trips. It was a great experience. The rooms are big and the beds are comfortable. I would say if I had to recommend one thing it would have to be new TV's in the rooms. That is just a minor thing. The breakfast was outstanding. Lasiandra the breakfast cook during the week is a great cook and wonderful person to start the day talking to.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Family Fun”
Reviews.Author: Sullivans5
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Embassy Suites North Labor Day Weekend 2010 and had an excellent trip. The hotel was great and the staff was very helpful. The made to order breakfast was out of this world. I would like to compliment Lassandra Campbell for the breakfast she prepared for my family. She was not only an excellent cook but also a pleasure to talk to. As a Hilton Diamond Club member I have stayed in many Hilton properties around the country and I would like to say that this Embassy Suites was one of the best. Please consider it on your next trip to Indianapolis.

Reviews.Title: “We just stayed there about a week ago...”
Reviews.Author: dc4168
Reviews.Content: We just stayed there about a week ago. The beds had a terrible infestation of bedbugs!! So gross!!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay - wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: hockeymomtraveler
Reviews.Content: We made a last minute weekend trip to Indianapolis and found a lot of the hotels were full. I picked the Embassy Suites based on past stays in other places. Suites are nice with teenagers (2 TVs and free breakfast make life so much easier). Check-in was fast even though it was very crowded. Our room was very nice and clean - perfect. The pool / hot tub areas were crowded but the staff kept it very clean and there was plenty of fresh towels (which is usually a problem at hotels when it's crowded). In the morning the breakfast area was crowded but they had a wonderful large staff to keep up with everything from cleaning the tables to making the food (it was impressive and everyone was smiling - that's rare these days). I can't say anything negative and I definetely recommend it. Plus: I'm a Priceline gal - I use it all the time - I couldn't use it this weekend since all the hotels were full. I paid full price and I don't regret it. WOW - that's something.

Reviews.Title: “Great for our travels”
Reviews.Author: FamilyofSix_Colorado
Reviews.Content: We stayed here during a road trip to see grandparents. The place was booked and we were disturbed by kids whose parents didn't tell them (at 11 PM) to go to bed! Anyway, the room was the typical Embassy Suites. It was clean and comfortable and the bed seemed new and the pillows fluffy. The alarm clock was a few hours off and we were unable to set it. My husband called the desk and they said they'd send someone up to set it as it has to be set by housekeeping and cannot be set by guest. The breakfast was the typical Embassy Suites fare (made to order omelet, decent coffee, and a bar of other things) so we stuffed ourselves before hitting the road. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice”
Reviews.Author: veteranbiztraveler
Reviews.Content: Overall stay exceeded our expectations. The staff is very friendly and attentive. Of particular note was Lassandra the breakfast chef who is outstanding. Goes above the ordinary.

Reviews.Title: “The staff is always friendly and accomodating for my business visits and shopping information for my wife.”
Reviews.Author: Bizman92
Reviews.Content: We were happily greeted as repeat Diamond members to this IN hotel. On this trip, Lassandra was courteous at breakfast and always greeted us w/ smiles in the early morning hours. From the front desk, Shawn helped my wife in the business center w/ a computer 'glitch' and Debbie was quick w/ a hand-off of a map to my wife, when it was deemed necessary for me to seek medical attention at the nearest hospital; we extended our stay due to this and the housing staff was fairly attentive to the Do Not Disturb Sign posted on our door, enabling me to sleep w/ pain-meds after the overnight ordeal in the ER. We will stay here again due to business in Indianapolis and the fact that 'midwestern hospitality' still resides at this Embassy Suites. Thanks, for making us feel welcome.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hotels we've ever had the pleasure of staying at!”
Reviews.Author: rwill1007
Reviews.Content: The whole staff led by Sharon at the front desk, couldn't have been more helpful, and gave us a great time. I needed some laundry done and that was excellent. The housekeeping staff (we stayed in Suite 702) couldn't have been better. Our rooms were well decorated, keep in excellent condition and all our needs were met. Great Job!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Most Friendly”
Reviews.Author: waretwogo
Reviews.Content: Check-in to Check out most friendly front desk. Shawn and Debbie were so very helpful.Cleanrooms, staff always had a smile.Thanks for a great weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Great choice for the North Indy/Carmel area”
Reviews.Author: msn58
Reviews.Content: Had a very nice stay here, 2 nights, without any problems. The rooms (suites) are very large and spacious. A work desk in the "living room" area was nicely sized and had a comfortable chair. Internet in the room (wireless) is $10/night, worked well and had a strong signal. As at all Embassy Suites, the evening reception (free drinks and snacks) and morning breakfast (hot) are included and a nice perk. There is a pool, whirlpool and sauna. Parking is plentiful and free. Service was efficient and friendly. There is room service, but only a very limited menu is offered. Though the room has two TVs, they are old style and the signal was poor/fuzzy on most all channels. Since the rest of the suite is modern and new, these old CRT televisions are a real anachronism. My only other criticism -- the bathroom was very small and cramped, especially relative to the size of the suite.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Leisure Trip with the Family and Friends”
Reviews.Author: Sexy001
Reviews.Content: My stay at Embassy Suites was so fantastic that I can't wait to stay there again before the summer is over. The staff was very polite and professional. I really would like to commend Lassandra Cambell, She did an outstanding job with taking care of all the people who had ordered cooked breakfast items.She greeted everyone with a smile and was very professional. She is one of the main reasons that I will be returning to Embassy Suites. She was very good with the teens with assisting them with whatever questions the teens asked her. Hats off to Lassandra Campbell.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: smerusi
Reviews.Content: Lassandra Campbell not only prepares a great breakfast, she does it with a level of customer service keeps me coming back. She is a pleasure to talk with each morning all while she produces fast and efficient breakfast service to the crowd of guests. Thank You Lassandra!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel has bed bugs!”
Reviews.Author: bug77_10
Reviews.Content: This hotel has bed bugs and the manager did not seem to care. This is highly irresponsible and negligent. I will never stay here again. I hope I did not bring my bed bugs home or they will hear from me.

Reviews.Title: “Not normal embassy suite hotel”
Reviews.Author: cobeshome
Reviews.Content: The room I had was not very good. a couple of the electrical outlets did not work. I never had water in the room as promised and my TV did not get all channels clearly. Also, an open bag of peanuts was behind the night stand with peanuts on the floor. I am not sure but black mold could be growing in the bathroom. This is not my first time staying in this hotels so I was very surprised. Also, this was disappointing because I love the embassy suites brand hotels in general. The breakfast buffet was excellent. The service was good the cook (Lassandra Campbell) was great. I also got good customer service from the restaurant.

Reviews.Title: “This is a great hotel with a great staff and we will stay there again and again.”
Reviews.Author: sa123456789
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself is very nice, has a great location and atmosphere, but the staff truely makes it a great stay. Becky, Mark, Lassandra , Sara, Kiesha and Jackieare just a few of the staff we encounter on a regular basis. Becky is very accomadating to her guests. She know many of the guest by name. Mark does a great job during the reception time interacting with guests. Lassandra also does a great job at breakfast cooking up excellent omlettes with a smile. We alway stay and eat in the evening and are very well taken care of by Sara, Kiesha and Jackie. We are usually greeted by name at this hotel. We will be back as often as we can when we visit Indianapolis.

Reviews.Title: “Lassandra, Breakfast Cook, makes the Embassy a great place to stay. Love the pancakes in the morning.”
Reviews.Author: AmyEB
Reviews.Content: Lassandra, Breakfast Cook, makes the Embassy a great place to stay. Love the pancakes in the morning. Front desk staff very helpful and friendly too - my home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “simple, easy, convienent”
Reviews.Author: jerryohara
Reviews.Content: I got in late, they had a room, made it simple, greeted with a smile, and I had the space and privacy of the two room suite. The next morning, breakfast was the same easy experience. I met Lassandra Campbell the morning chef, who made a great omlet with a smile. Not quite like home but almost.

Reviews.Title: “Not a disappointing choice for a memorable and romantic stay!!”
Reviews.Author: mewowz
Reviews.Content: My husband and I ended up getting married locally at an intimate wedding on his birthday. We had dinner reservations in Indy that night, so I searched for a romantic, unique hotel for literally three weeks. I did not want to be disappointed on our wedding night and I wanted to escape from the midwest as much as possible until our real honeymoon. From the moment we arrived, I knew I made the right choice. The facade could have been in several foreign locales - the lobby was beautiful - the tropical atrium was perfect! The staff was super friendly and congratulatory and the reservation was without any errors. I reserved the Romance Package. The suite has french doors in from the atrium, then beautiful modern/traditional decor in a living area; complete with sleeper sofa, wet bar, table, and tv. The bathroom is in the hallway - it is small but just fine with granite (?) vanity and a nice shower. There is another door there, then a beautiful sleeping area with another vanity and tv, and french doors out to a wrought iron balcony -- our view was of a pond - I'm certain the best view they could have given us. We even saw a large snapping turtle in it and a heron the next morning - with a bird's nest near our balcony and dutiful mother swinging in every now and then. The Romance Package was delightful - the champagne was delicious and we were given a gift basket and card - it was perfect for us. The only disappointment of the whole stay was that the heater in the pool was being repaired and it was brisk - but it was still a lovely variating depth pool beside a large whirlpool - if you sat in the hot tub long enough it made the pool water bearable. :) It wasn't bad enough to ruin our stay. Breakfast the next morning was plentiful and tasty - sitting in the atrium felt like we were thousands of miles away. We also befriended their Macaw, Sweetie, who is quite the ham and gave us plenty of sugary pictures. We had a GREAT time and I was SO relieved. Oh - and I thought the bed was perfect - but I like firm - and he did not - he likes soft. The down pillows are fabulous. If you want to escape from the ordinary, stay at the Embassy Suites in Indy. You will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for business and wonderful free breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: TahoeTragert
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Embassy Suites on a recent business trip and loved the service and the amenities. Lassandra was the breakfast cook both mornings and she was so cheerful serving up delicous omellettes at the breakfast buffet. I also enjoyed the managers reception each evening with complimentary cocktails.

Reviews.Title: “Faboulous”
Reviews.Author: pickle011
Reviews.Content: I have add a fabulous time here at the hotel during my business stay. The breakfast staff is wonderful. The breakfast cook Ms. Lassandra is awesome and the sweetest woman to meet who makes wonderful french toast. I would like to recogize her and her faboulous staff. Again, thanks.

Reviews.Title: “I love staying here.”
Reviews.Author: dancermommd
Reviews.Content: We always try to stay at this hotel. It is a convenient location with plenty of restaurant options around. But the very best part of this hotel is Lassandra the breakfast cook. She always remembers me when I visit with a conversation and she cooks everything perfectly (without a lot of grease). I will miss her greatly if we ever change locations of our meetings. They recently remodeled all the rooms so they are all fresh and up to date. The elevators are slow but what the heck. And make sure to stop to say hello to "Sweetie" the bird.

Reviews.Title: “Staff are Great”
Reviews.Author: Spencer83
Reviews.Content: We stay here consistently about once a month on business travel. Enjoy the happy hour and breakfast ammenities, particularly. Hotel could use some upgrades physically, but the staff is top notch. Especially appreciate the bartender, Mark, at happy hour--consistently friendly and accomodating, and Lassandra the breakfast chef whips up your omelette or eggs with a great smile to start the day. Rarely eat here, but we did have the lunch pasta/soup/salad bar and was very pleasantly surprised at the quality and value. Again, the chef making the pasta dishes to order had a great attitude and did a nice job on the food.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: Rob2010BB
Reviews.Content: Embassy Suites North has the best service. The evening Manager's reception is very nice. The moring breakfast by Lassandra is fantastic. She does very well and i enjoy her breakfast every time I stay. The only downside is the charge for Internet services.

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: devers89
Reviews.Content: We stayed for two nights and the service was great. When we went for breakfast o Friday morning we got down a little late and there was a long line. The cook Lassandra, was really hustling to get people thru the line and did a wonderful job at getting the breakfast made correctly! This is a great place to stay and would advise anyone to check the Embassy Suites out

Reviews.Title: “Delightful”
Reviews.Author: GZD
Reviews.Content: I was on a business trip last week from Monday through Thursday. A bunch of us from all over the country stayed at the embassy Suites in No. Indianapolis, IN. Aside from all the staff being so kind with a professional attitude I remember specifically the morning breakfast cook Cassandra being very friendly and accomodating, which made mornings much more pleasurable for us all. Thank you so much to you all.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: luvtraveling25
Reviews.Content: Room and location were average, however it was the service of the staff that will make our family a returning guest. The front desk, espiciall Sharren and Bryan, made us feel welcomed as soon as we arrived and acknowledged us as we passed the Front Desk as well. The restuarant staff was friendly and accomodated our picky eaters well, very good food. I would suggest this hotel to any family or traveler that wants to stay somewhere they feel welcomed and a part of the family.

Reviews.Title: “Choose Elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: ILTraveler012
Reviews.Content: We did a family getaway, and chose Embassy Suites due to a previous fantastic experience in another city. This one did not compare! The room was small and a bit shabby (stains on sofa cushions, etc.) The design of the hotel makes for a very noisy experience in the room (large open atrium and all rooms glass fronted.) There was NO hot water in the morning due to a boiler breakdown. The hotel calls in extra security on the weekends to deal with the crowds of families, which seems like a bad omen. Too many people taking advantage of the free cocktails makes for encounters with drunks in the elevator. Breakfast was mediocre at best. Desk staff were friendly, however other staff were non-committal (my previous experience included very friendly staff at all points in the hotel.)

Reviews.Title: “Dirty hotel. Did not live up to standards.”
Reviews.Author: Jackal24
Reviews.Content: When we checked in and went to our room, the first thing we noticed was a mound of garbage piled near the elevator. This was several garbage bags, obviously left by a housekeeper as they performed other duties. When we left a couple of hours later for dinner, the garbage was still there, although it was finally removed a couple of hours after that. The second issue we had was that the individual shampoo/conditioner bottles had already been opened and used; new ones were not provided until I asked the front desk for some. Other complaints include: the pool was colder than it should have been, there was a stain on the sheet for the pullout sofa, and the hotel was loud (this is a complaint of design though: atrium style hotels usually are louder.) Internet access is noted as free on embassysuites.com for this hotel, but there was a 9.95 charge. The front desk was very pleasant and accommodating, and the lady working the omelet station at breakfast was amazing (fast and efficient, but fun too. All in all though, I would not recommend this hotel. It does not live up to the Embassy name.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, small rooms, no free wireless”
Reviews.Author: magellan602
Reviews.Content: Generally you stay at an Embassy Suites for the "Suite factor". While I did get a 2 room suite, the front room was tiny and the bathroom was only accessible from the bedroom. Luckily I was there alone, but if I was with my family of 4 it would have been a problem. I have stayed at other Embassy Suites before with more spacious rooms. No free wireless internet. Otherwise the hotel is nice and the included breakfast is great. It is a bit expensive to stay in this area, and the Embassy is one of the more affordable choices. It is near the Hyatt and the Westin, close to the new Convention Center and restaurants in Downtown Indy. Be sure and check out the "Rhythm Discovery Center", America's only museum devoted entirely to drumming.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay for the price”
Reviews.Author: MichiganMomof3
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Embassy Suites for 3 nights over Christmas with lots of family members--I think we had 10 rooms in all. It was great because it wasn't very crowded due to the holidays. Our family gets together every year in Indy and we have tried several hotels in the area. The room fit my family of 5 without being too crowded and they have microwaves and a little fridge. Nice to be able to put the kids to bed and shut the divider door and hang out and watch tv. The omelets at breakfast were very tasty and there was enough variety in the buffet to keep everyone happy. The pool is pretty small and the hot tub wasn't really hot, but the littler kids still had fun playing. The staff was very friendly and attentive to our needs. This place is great for the price and we would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty, dated and bad timing!”
Reviews.Author: feken2008
Reviews.Content: I paid too much for a dirty and dated - badly need of repair room! And apparently there was a soccer tournament going on. There goes our weekend getaway! There were a lot of little girls in their soccer uniform everywhere from early in the morning to late at night. Mind you..not all of them were well behaved. I took some pictures of the dated furnitures, the unfinished sink, dirty bathroom, peeling wall, and cracked ceiling. you be the judge if you want to stay in this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for families”
Reviews.Author: momoholic
Reviews.Content: We stayed here during my daughter's soccer tournament. It was a great hotel for kids to run around and have fun. You could see where they were at all times. Free hot breakfast & manager's reception was great too!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel-COLD pool!”
Reviews.Author: lahnie1675
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very nice and the entire hotel was clean. We too stayed with all the soccer kids (as stated in a previous review)-though we did have kids with us-both under the age of 5-never roaming the hotel on their own. Aside from the waits for elevators (the kids kept hitting the buttons on their way out) and breakfast, the pool was way too cold to enjoy! It was warmer in the morning (which seems strange), but I doubt it's heated. This was a HUGE disappointment to us!
